ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Plotting functions for posterior analysis,  prior and posterior predictive checks, and MCMC diagnostics.  The package is designed not only to provide convenient functionality  for users, but also a common set of functions that can be easily used by  developers working on a variety of R packages for Bayesian modeling,  particularly (but not exclusively) packages interfacing with 'Stan'.

Plotting functions for posterior analysis,  prior and posterior predictive checks, and MCMC diagnostics.  The package is designed not only to provide convenient functionality  for users, but also a common set of functions that can be easily used by  developers working on a variety of R packages for Bayesian modeling,  particularly (but not exclusively) packages interfacing with 'Stan'.

name: r-bayesplot
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.15.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bayesplot
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bayesplot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bayesplot/bayesplot_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 114a99322fea66e3db911a3ea9d9272ad8aa7d247991c8fe5d4fb6aa2629479c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=0.8.0
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.4.0
    - r-ggridges >=0.5.5
    - r-glue
    - r-posterior
    - r-reshape2
    - r-rlang >=0.3.0
    - r-tibble >=2.0.0
    - r-tidyr
    - r-tidyselect
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=0.8.0
    - r-ggplot2 >=3.4.0
    - r-ggridges >=0.5.5
    - r-glue
    - r-posterior
    - r-reshape2
    - r-rlang >=0.3.0
    - r-tibble >=2.0.0
    - r-tidyr
    - r-tidyselect

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bayesplot')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bayesplot')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://mc-stan.org/bayesplot
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Plotting functions for posterior analysis,  prior and posterior predictive checks, and MCMC diagnostics.  The package is designed not only to provide convenient functionality  for users, but also a common set of functions that can be easily used by  developers working on a variety of R packages for Bayesian modeling,  particularly
    (but not exclusively) packages interfacing with 'Stan'.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bayesplot
# Type: Package
# Title: Plotting for Bayesian Models
# Version: 1.7.0
# Date: 2019-05-22
# Authors@R: c(person("Jonah", "Gabry", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "jsg2201@columbia.edu"), person("Tristan", "Mahr", role = "aut"), person("Paul-Christian", "Burkner", role = "ctb"), person("Martin", "Modrak", role = "ctb"), person("Malcolm", "Barrett", role = "ctb"))
# Maintainer: Jonah Gabry <jsg2201@columbia.edu>
# Description: Plotting functions for posterior analysis,  prior and posterior predictive checks, and MCMC diagnostics.  The package is designed not only to provide convenient functionality  for users, but also a common set of functions that can be easily used by  developers working on a variety of R packages for Bayesian modeling,  particularly (but not exclusively) packages interfacing with 'Stan'.
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# LazyData: TRUE
# URL: https://mc-stan.org/bayesplot
# BugReports: https://github.com/stan-dev/bayesplot/issues/
# SystemRequirements: pandoc (>= 1.12.3), pandoc-citeproc

# Imports: dplyr (>= 0.8.0), ggplot2 (>= 2.2.1), ggridges, glue, reshape2, rlang (>= 0.3.0), stats, tibble, tidyselect, utils
# Suggests: gridExtra (>= 2.2.1), hexbin, knitr (>= 1.16), loo (>= 2.0.0), RColorBrewer, rmarkdown (>= 1.0.0), rstan (>= 2.17.1), rstanarm (>= 2.17.4), rstantools (>= 1.5.0), scales, shinystan (>= 2.3.0), testthat (>= 2.0.0), vdiffr
